title: Research Introduction: Business Analytics, Data Science, and Machine Learning Trends
text: The rise of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) continues to reshape job markets across industries worldwide. This analysis examines the evolving landscape of hiring trends, which skills are now more in-demand and how job descriptions for roles in business analytics, data science, and machine learning have changed, with a particular focus on the requirements for AI and ML expertise. It explores how the integration of advanced analytics is driving changes in hiring practices, identifies the industries that are most aggressively recruiting data scientists, and evaluates the career prospects for business analytics professionals in this rapidly transforming technological environment.

title: Research Introduction: Business Analytics, Data Science, and Machine Learning Trends
text:
Literature Review
Research indicates that AI and machine learning are reshaping labor markets by increasing skill demands, raising entry barriers, and emphasizing data science and technical expertise for business competitiveness. AI is transforming labor market skill demands. It emphasizes the increasing importance of digital literacy and cognitive adaptability (Green (2024)). Machine learning raises job entry barriers by increasing experience and technical skill expectations (Liu, Liu, and Huang (2024)). Tewsadsast (owolabi2024advent?)
